title: Is the plot proposed to be filled upto the level of the abutting road or Reduced Level (R
clause_text: Is the plot proposed to be filled upto the level of the abutting road or Reduced Level (R.L.) 27.55 m Town Hall Datum, whichever is more? The details of the materials to be used in construction with specifications are as follows:
